actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to modify the proposed regulation relating to the use of the cents-per-mile valuation rule in valuing the fringe benefit received by an employee for personal use of a vehicle provided by his employer.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to make modifications in the proposed regulations relating to the use of the cents-per-mile valuation rule in valuing the fringe benefit received by an employee for personal use of a vehicle provided by an employer.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to modify the proposed regulation relating to the use of the cents-per-mile valuation rule in valuing the fringe benefit received by an employee for personal use of a vehicle provided by his employer.
